body:
Hai,
I don't know if anyone has ever done this before. If they have you can lock it but if they haven't go ahead and post your favourite map on Avicus below! It can be anything... CTH, DTM, Walls, CTW... anything!
Mine is Senex 1

title: Favourite Avicus Map!
